sentences.english: Danyun (Red-Cloud) Valley, a name which compares the red leaves to red clouds.
sentences.chinese: 丹雲峽，把成片的紅葉比作紅色的雲彩。

sentences.english: We just peel the stickers off, cut them up, and throw them in your iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 我們只是揭掉商標然後把它們切成片丟進你的冰茶裏。

sentences.english: In cities, modules can be stacked to make a new generation of efficient buildings.
sentences.chinese: 城市裏，模型房能建造成片形成新一代的有效住房。

sentences.english: The tofu needs to be cut into slices first.
sentences.chinese: 這豆腐乾要把它先片成片。

sentences.english: By policy, the police impolitely sliced the politician's politics books.
sentences.chinese: 依政策，警察沒禮貌的把政治家的政治書切成片。

sentences.english: In fact, you can cut the mushrooms into pieces, dry them in the sun and preserve them.
sentences.chinese: 其實喫不完的蘑菇還可以切成片曬乾保存起來。

sentences.english: Also can become in gardens piece cultivated, it is the better land that watch a flower by the plant.
sentences.chinese: 也可在園林中成片栽植，是較好的觀花地被植物。

sentences.english: The single crystal is sectioned and then sliced and subsliced with a diamond .
sentences.chinese: 用金剛石鋸先將單晶體切成段，再切成片。

sentences.english: It can be sliced and eaten as a salad.
sentences.chinese: 它也可以切成片條以色拉的形式食用。

sentences.english: The masson pines of the forest area are oversized, easy to have the big area plant disease.
sentences.chinese: 馬尾松成片林面積過大，易產生大面積的病害。

sentences.english: Slice the ginger or beat it with cooking knife;
The Large expanse of granulose grows, does not have the inflammation, but very difficult to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 成片小粒生長，無炎症，但很難退去。

sentences.english: Raytheon even as tablets, rain Gouhe Man.
sentences.chinese: 雷聲連成片，雨下溝河漫。

sentences.english: Acres of black and yellow smoke rolled steadily towards the sea .
sentences.chinese: 成片的黑黃色的濃煙不斷地滾滾湧向大海。

sentences.english: Patches of resprouted trees now border the lakeshore.
sentences.chinese: 現在在湖邊可以看到成片的新生樹木。

sentences.english: There's lots of modern parts of Shanghai but it's the ye olde areas we love.
sentences.chinese: 上海有成片現代的區域，但是我們就是愛老區。
